name: Emiline: The Ghost of White Willow
storyline: A Gothic Horror set during the events of D-Day 1944. A British Parachute regiment finds themselves held up in a medieval manor house on the coastline of Jersey. Alfred Stuart gets left behind to look after an injured comrade when things start to take a dark turn; the manor house begins to unleash its hate onto its new victim.
summary: A psychological horror VR game. Taking place during the events of D-day, find yourself trapped in the gothic horrors of White Willow Manor Hall. Follow your sections lieutenant into combat before fighting a new battle of survival in the dark haunted past of the house.
